channel.title: Dungeoneering pi help
channel.description: i want to add my own dungeoneering like i want to add when players kills any monster get dung exp and some dung tokens how i do that :(

item.title: Dungeoneering pi help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If you don’t know some of the rather basics… I feel you should start reading up on java…

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering pi help
item.dc:creator: @vernix vernix
item.description:
@vernix wrote:

[quote=“kidgoku4522, post:4, topic:497890”][quote author=vernix link=topic=616121.msg4242918#msg4242918 date=1361929240]

i want to add my own dungeoneering like i want to add when players kills any monster get dung exp and some dung tokens how i do that

You need to make the server know that the npc’s you pick are npc’s for dungoneering first.
Then you need to tell the server to add X exp and X tokens when the NPC is dead.

do u have a tutorial for that ??
[/quote]
Just make a exp lamp with dung exp And make it drop a alt for dung tokens :)[/quote]
that what i dont know how to do it?

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering pi help
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[quote=“vernix, post:3, topic:497890”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=616121.msg4242908#msg4242908 date=1361927486]

i want to add my own dungeoneering like i want to add when players kills any monster get dung exp and some dung tokens how i do that

You need to make the server know that the npc’s you pick are npc’s for dungoneering first.
Then you need to tell the server to add X exp and X tokens when the NPC is dead.
[/quote]
do u have a tutorial for that ??[/quote]
Just make a exp lamp with dung exp And make it drop a alt for dung tokens

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering pi help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

vernix:

i want to add my own dungeoneering like i want to add when players kills any monster get dung exp and some dung tokens how i do that

You need to make the server know that the npc’s you pick are npc’s for dungoneering first.
Then you need to tell the server to add X exp and X tokens when the NPC is dead.

Read full topic
